name: Lilo & Stitch Pinball
storyline: This pinball game features characters from Disney's summer hit, Lilo & Stitch. Collect cans on the beach, feed the fish, go surfing, and ultimately fly off into space to blast police spaceships. You didn't think you could do THAT with pinball, did ya?
summary: Lilo & Stitch Pinball is a pinball computer game based on Lilo & Stitch.
